description: Complete API and MCP documentation for Publora social media scheduling platform supporting Twitter LinkedIn Instagram Threads TikTok YouTube Facebook Bluesky Mastodon Telegram with REST API endpoints MCP server integration analytics workspace management
rules: Publora REST API base URL is https://api.publora.com
Publora MCP server is hosted at mcp.publora.com
Authentication uses Bearer token with Publora API key (sk_...)
16 MCP tools available for posts, connections, analytics, and workspace
Supports 10 platforms: Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, Threads, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Bluesky, Mastodon, Telegram
MCP config type must be 'http' not 'url'
No coding required for MCP - users describe tasks in natural language
Pricing starts at $5.40/month with full API and MCP access
